text: What is this, a crossover episode? On Tuesday night Millie Bobby Brown ( a. k. a. Eleven from Stranger Things ) went on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon and revealed that she loves Keeping Up with the Kardashians. It was only a matter of time before the Kardashian clan saw this. I love you @ milliebbrown, you are so adorable! Thanks for watching # KUWTK!
